name: Spirit of Omen's Awakening: Cryo
description:
Character deals +1 DMG and converts Physical DMG to Cryo DMG.
This character takes +2 Cryo DMG.
Duration (Rounds): 2
descriptionraw: Character <color=#FFFFFFFF>deals +1 DMG</color> and converts $[K100] to $[K101].\nThis character takes +2 $[K101].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>
